|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== [https://www.scribd.com/document/34223/BeWAN-Ibox-Introduction Manual] "P/N: 141451A20000J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV4510PW-A-LF-L3 (''Astoria Networks'') There is a VIA VT6212L USB 2.0 controller on-board. {{see also|Wippies WifiBox (APG61)}} ==Links of Interest== Wippies HomeBox - [http://forum.wippies.com/wiki/Homebox_-_Hardware Hardware on the '''Wippies''' wiki] *[http://code.google.com/p/quickanddirty/wiki/WippiesHomeBox On the '''Google Code''' wiki] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv4510pw ''ARV4510PW'' the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=15934 Router based on the Infineon Danube] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=155438 ''Bewan iBox'' on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=20044&start=30 ''Homebox/Wifibox'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://murobbs.muropaketti.com/threads/bewan-ibox-firmis-elisa-viihde-wippies-etc.582189/page-2 ''BeWAN iBox'' on '''MuroBBS'''] • [http://listing.driveragent.com/c/pci_print/168c/001a 168c:001a] 
Ethernet controller [0200]: Atheros Communications Inc. AR2413/AR2414 
  Wireless Network Adapter [AR5005G(S) 802.11bg] [168c:001a] (rev 01)
  Subsystem: Accton Technology Corporation Device [1113:4413]
